patch 8.2.2384: turtle filetype not recognized

Problem:    Turtle filetype not recognized.
Solution:   Add a rule to detect turtle files. (closes #7722)

patch 8.2.2383: focus escape sequences are not named

Problem:    Focus escape sequences are not named in ":set termcap" output.
Solution:   Add the names to the list. (closes #7718)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c5f59fab23820454f060562927ddc1397f9d479a|patch 8.2.2381: Vim9: divide by zero does not abort expression execution>
patch 8.2.2381: Vim9: divide by zero does not abort expression execution

Problem:    Vim9: divide by zero does not abort expression execution.
Solution:   Use a "failed" flag. (issue #7704)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2381: Vim9: divide by zero does not abort expression execution · vim/vim@c5f59fa
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2381: Vim9: divide by zero does not abort expression execution · vim/vim@c5f59fa
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: divide by zero does not abort expression execution. Solution: Use a "failed" flag. (issue #7704)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a0f7f73ebb3ab032af08699c24c465403512b7d8|patch 8.2.2380: Vim9: occasional crash when using try/catch and a timer>
patch 8.2.2380: Vim9: occasional crash when using try/catch and a timer

Problem:    Vim9: occasional crash when using try/catch and a timer.
Solution:   Save and restore "need_rethrow" when invoking a timer callback.
            (closes #7708)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2380: Vim9: occasional crash when using try/catch and a timer · vim/vim@a0f7f73
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2380: Vim9: occasional crash when using try/catch and a timer · vim/vim@a0f7f73
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: occasional crash when using try/catch and a timer. Solution: Save and restore "need_rethrow" when invoking a timer callback. (closes #7708)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/77a849c4b3d73c228013a047913c90834a93b4f6|patch 8.2.2379: do spell suggestions twice if 'spellsuggest' contains…>
patch 8.2.2379: do spell suggestions twice if 'spellsuggest' contains number

Problem:    Finding spell suggestions twice if 'spellsuggest' contains number.
Solution:   Only do internal suggestions once.  (closes #7713)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2379: do spell suggestions twice if 'spellsuggest' contains… · vim/vim@77a849c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2379: do spell suggestions twice if 'spellsuggest' contains… · vim/vim@77a849c
attachments.text: … number Problem: Finding spell suggestions twice if 'spellsuggest' contains number. Solution: Only do internal suggestions once. (closes #7713)

patch 8.2.2378: Vim9: no error message for dividing by zero

Problem:    Vim9: no error message for dividing by zero.
Solution:   Give an error message. (issue #7704)
